titles.title: Improving Seniors Access to Quality Benefits Act

A bill to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a study and submit a report on the effects of the inclusion of quality increases in the determination of blended benchmark amounts under part C of the Medicare program.
Improving Seniors Access to Quality Benefits Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Improving Seniors Access to Quality Benefits Act
This bill requires the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services to report on how the inclusion of quality percentage increases affects certain payment calculations under Medicare Advantage.
